Package seemlmot

Class Storage

java.lang.Object
seemlmot.Storage
public class Storage extends Object
Handles loading and saving tasks from/to a hard disk file. This class ensures that the chatbot's state is preserved between sessions.

  • Constructor Details

    • Storage

      public Storage()

  • Method Details

    • loadData

      public static ArrayList<Task> loadData()
      Loads tasks from the storage file defined in FILE_PATH. If the file or directory does not exist, it starts with an empty list.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList of tasks retrieved from the file.

    • createTaskFromType

      private static void createTaskFromType(String line) throws IOException
      Parses a single line from the storage file and adds the corresponding task to dataList. This is a non-trivial private method that handles data validation and type-specific parsing.
      Parameters:
      line - A single line of text from the saved file.
      Throws:
      IOException - If the task type is unrecognized or file format is corrupted.
      SeemlmotException - If required parameters are missing in the data line.

    • saveState

      public static void saveState(String currentDescription, ArrayList<Task> cmdList)
      Saves the current list of tasks to the hard disk. Creates the directory structure if it does not already exist.
      Parameters:
      currentDescription - The command string, expected to be just "save".
      cmdList - The current list of tasks to be written to the file.
      Throws:
      SeemlmotException - If additional arguments are provided after "save".
